So far as I know no legit release of the version exists.  This is a 3-hour cut; there is an even shorter version that has had a DVD rerelease.  If you have a better version PLEASE upload and share.

A young couple moves to a quiet New England village, only to soon find themselves mixed up in mysterious rituals.

The Dark Secret of Harvest Home is a 1978 television miniseries thriller, produced by Universal TV. The screenplay was based on the 1973 novel Harvest Home by Tom Tryon.

Cast and crew

It was directed by Leo Penn and stars Bette Davis, David Ackroyd, Joanna Miles, Rosanna Arquette, Michael O'Keefe, Rene Auberjonois, and Tracey Gold.
Release

The Dark Secret Of Harvest Home was shown on the TNT Channel in 1992, in two parts. This two parter is the full 3 Hour 52 Minute and 40 second version.

The Dark Secret Of Harvest Home has been released on video; this version is edited, and only 2 hours long.

The Chapters to this series are:

    Part 1 :Ploughing Day, Planting Day, Agnes Fair, Choosing The Young Lord, The Day Of Seasoning
    Part 2 :Tithing Day, Sheaving Tide, Husking Bee, Corn Play, Kindling Night, Harvest Home
